casebody.data:
Kathleen S. LUCCI, a Married Woman, Petitioner
v.
The LILLIAN J. ROEHL REVOCABLE TRUST DATED MARCH 21, 2014, Alice E. Roberts, and Paul S. Roberts, Individually and in their capacity as Trustees of the Lillian J. Roehl Revocable Trust, Respondents No. 399 WAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. April 3, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 3rd day of April, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
